attributes.action: Strict prescribing rules for topical corticosteroids - ending Red Skin Syndrome
attributes.additional_details: The over prescribing and mis-prescribing of topical cortiocosteroids is causing widespread suffering due to their side effects.
attributes.background: Put in place legislation to regulate and monitor the prescribing of topical corticosteroids to a much higher degree.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:


Review prescribing of topical corticosteroids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657655
